src.SecurityLightController

Class TestSecurityControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.SecurityLightController.TestSecurityControl

  • public class TestSecurityControl
extends java.lang.Object
    This class will house all JUnit test cases for the Security Light application
    Author:
    Chris Silvano, Alex Spradlin, Casey Layne

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) SecurityLampSimulatedUI lampGUI 
      (package private) LightDeviceInterface lightDeviceInterface 
      (package private) LightControllerStateMachine lightStateMachine 
      (package private) LightControllerStateMachineObserverInterface lightStateMachineObserverInterface 
      (package private) LightTimerInterface lightTimerInterface 
      (package private) TestStateMachineObserver testStateMachineObserver 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TestSecurityControl() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void alarmClearedLampOff()
      This method checks if clearing the alarm while the light is on with the intrusion being detected results in the system returning back to its night time mode with the light being off - author Chris Silvano
      void alarmClearedLampOn()
      This method checks if clearing the alarm while the light is on with the intrusion being detected results in the system returning back to its night time mode with the light being off - author Chris Silvano
      void initialStartUp()
      Test initial boot-up of system into correct state - author Chris Silvano
      void lampOffDaySensorDark()
      This method tests the state transition from Lamp Off Daylight to Lamp Off Nighttime with the event LIGHT_SENSOR_DARKENED.
      void lampOffDaySwitchOn()
      This method tests the state transition from Lamp Off Daylight to Lamp On Full with the event MANUAL_SWITCH_ON.
      void lampOffNightMotion()
      This method tests the state transition from Lamp Off Nighttime to Motion Detected with the event MOTION_DETECTED.
      void lampOffNightSensorLight()
      This method tests the state transition from Lamp Off Nighttime to Lamp Off Daylight with the event LIGHT_SENSOR_LIGHTENED.
      void lampOffNightSwitchOn()
      This method tests the state transition from Lamp Off Nighttime to Lamp On Nighttime Brightness with the event MANUAL_SWITCH_ON.
      void lampOnFullSensorDark()
      This method tests the state transition from Lamp On Full to Lamp On Nighttime Brightness with the event LIGHT_SENSOR_DARKENED.
      void lampOnFullSwitchOff()
      This method tests the state transition from Lamp On Full to Lamp Off Daylight with the event MANUAL_SWITCH_OFF.
      void lampOnNightSensorLight()
      This method tests the state transition from Lamp On Nighttime Brightness to Lamp On Full with the event LIGHT_SENSOR_LIGHTENED.
      void lampOnNightSwitchOff()
      This method tests the state transition from Lamp On Nighttime Brightness to Lamp Off Nighttime with the event MANUAL_SWITCH_OFF.
      void securityAlarmTrippedMotion()
      This method checks when it is night time that the alarm being tripped from motion being detected results in the security light turning and an intrusion being detected - author Chris Silvano
      void securityAlarmTrippedNight()
      This method checks when it is night time that the alarm being tripped results in the security light turning and an intrusion being detected - author Chris Silvano
      void setUpTests()
      Set-up JUnit test cases.
      void testImproperLampOffNight()
      This method tests signalling an irrelevant event from the state Lamp Off Nighttime - author Alex Spradlin
      void testImproperLampOnFull()
      This method tests signalling an irrelevant event from the state Lamp On Full - author Alex Spradlin
      void testImproperLampOnNight()
      This method tests signalling an irrelevant event from the state Lamp On Nighttime Brightness - author Alex Spradlin
      void testImproperLightOffDay()
      This method tests what happens when a signal tells it not to change states.
      void testIntrusionDetectedLampOnExpired()
      This method tests the LAMP_TIMER_EXPIRED event during INTRUSION_DETECTED LAMP_ON state, and then check the LAMP_TIMER_EXPIRED event during INTRUSION_DETECTED LAMP_OFF state.
      void testTimerExpired()
      This method tests the LAMP_TIMER_EXPIRED event during Motion Detected state.
      void testUnsubscribe()
      This method tests unsubscribing an observeer - author Alex Spradlin

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
